https://tmrev.io/movie/440264-Chiusura 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The suburbs of Padua, in northeast Italy. Flavia, a hairdresser, is closing the shop after 43 years of activity. He is 61 years old. He left school when he was 11. He made the hairdresser always. He is leaving behind a clientele of older women who did hair for years at a rate of regular appointments. He knows every single hair of their heads. Chiusura
